# image

**Article**

An image file for which the runtime should search.

## Overview

Assign this property a path to a PNG or JPEG file.

### Declaration

```other
uniform asset image
```

### Define a reference image

The following [doc://com.apple.usd/documentation/USD/preliminary-referenceimage] assigns this property a file named `image.png`.

```other
def Preliminary_ReferenceImage "ImageReference"
{
    uniform asset image = @image.png@
    ...
}
```

## Properties

- **physicalWidth**: An image’s width in centimeters.
